snippet: With much to teach, teams may fill positions like spread game analyst, assistant offensive line coach and sports science coordinator.
lead_paragraph: With much to teach, teams may fill positions like spread game analyst, assistant offensive line coach and sports science coordinator.

headline.seo: Specialization Fuels Growth in N.F.L. Coaching Staffs
headline.main: No Matter the Role, There’s a Coach for That
